links.name: Alarms
links.description: Can be bypassed with Hardware (5, 1 minute)

links.name: Trip beams
links.description: Perception to detect. Escape artist to go through.

links.name: Infrared emitter
links.description: Invisible to sight laser or high perception test

links.name: Pressure pads
links.description: Percetion(3/4 on outdoor pressure mesh). If failed, second perception test allows for Reaction + Intuition (Body) to remove pressure

links.name: Motion sensors
links.description: Ultrasonic field requires ultrasound sensor within 5 meters to perceive. Sneaking (3) afterwards. Wired characters negative bonus per bonus initiative

links.name: Sound vibration detector
links.description: Sensitive microphones pick up sounds and vibrations. Requires Infiltration(3)

links.name: Security Cameras
links.description: Camera may have thermographic vision or low-light sensors

links.name: Olfactory pheromone scanners
links.description: Detects chemicals in air, particularly for nitrogen rich particles from explosives and ammunition. Rolls ating(3) to detect. Easier when more explosives. Detects metahuman pheromone.

links.name: Magnetic Anomaly Detectors (MADs)
links.description: Single hit on device rating will detect any metals

links.name: Millimeter wave detection (cyberware scanner)
links.description: Detects weapons and prohibited cybertech. Depends on quality and situation
